BPSR METER: WAHF EDITION
========================

A real-time DPS meter overlay for Blue Protocol: Star Resonance
Modified and customized by WAHF

REQUIREMENTS:
- Windows 10/11
- Npcap (for packet capture)
  Download: https://npcap.com/#download
  Install with "WinPcap API-compatible Mode" enabled

INSTALLATION:
1. Extract all files from the ZIP to a folder of your choice
2. Run "BPSR Meter - WAHF Edition.exe"
3. The overlay will appear in the top-right corner of your screen

FEATURES:
- 70% scale by default (adjustable with scale button: 1, 7, 5, 3)
- Cyan accent colors
- Auto-positions to top-right corner
- Real-time DPS/HPS tracking
- Nearby and Solo modes

CONTROLS:
- Drag button: Move the overlay (when unlocked)
- Lock button: Lock position to prevent accidental moves
- Scale button (shows current scale): Click to cycle through sizes
- Close button: Close the app

NOTES:
- After launching, change instance or line in-game for the meter to start detecting players
- The overlay is click-through when not hovering over controls
